channel.title: Comments on: Review: Folk of the Air Series (Holly Black)
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Annie
item.dc:creator: Annie
item.description: I love love love this series. Maybe I love it more because I didn't think I would. It was a series I downloaded to pass time and I read all book under three days. It is true beautiful. I'll definitely check out the other Twin-laced books
item.content:encoded: I love love love this series. Maybe I love it more because I didn’t think I would. It was a series I downloaded to pass time and I read all book under three days. It is true beautiful. I’ll definitely check out the other Twin-laced books
